jobs.description: Reserveit is the first online restaurant reservation platform based in Bangladesh. This is a simple and user-friendly application for selecting restaurants and booking seats for your next dine-out.

PND Service is a software that works with people all over the country who are constantly trying to be entrepreneurs from Brogrammers Lab. However, due to insufficient capital, delivery, and packaging problems, they are unable to proceed. PND service will allow you to do business in the whole of Bangladesh without any capital. You can sell PND products without any investment. By doing this, PND will ship your ordered product to the recipient's address with a service fee from your profit share. And the profit money will go to your address.
